data.title: What languages can I use for captions and subtitles?
data.meta_description: You can add subtitles or captions in any of the languages listed below. If you're uploading a file in a dialect that our player doesn't...
data.text:
You can add subtitles or captions in any of the languages listed below. If you're uploading a file in a dialect that our player doesn't seem to support, feel free to get in touch.

If you want to add closed captions in multiple languages, refer to How to add multiple audio tracks article.

Abkhazian (ab)

Afar (aa)

Afrikaans (af)

Albanian (sq)

Amharic (am)

Arabic (ar)

Armenian (hy)

Assamese (as)

Aymara (ay)
